Stage 1 ( pilot ) : Placebo control , double blind comparison ass effect time product administration ( i.e . breakfast lunch v breakfast dinner ) . Stage 2 ( main study ) : Placebo control double blind comparison product administer breakfast dinner . A total 64 subject include study ; stage 1 : n=15 , stage 2 : n=49 .
